entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Breaking Change: Revert the Console Formatter Default in .NET 6 Container Images #216

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet-pgo create-mibc` emits warnings for being unable to find dynamic assemblies #68000
  • WasmTestRunner failing with assertion for generic math tests involving float/double #67999
  • `Half.operator %` seems to randomly fail on some configuration #67993
  • TraceSwitch value is not read from config #67991
  • MethodInfo objects for same method are not equal #67989
  • [API Proposal]: Create PFX file (PKCS#12) from .cer .key and password. #67987
  • [release/5.0] Should we revert adding libssl3 dependency to enable installation on Ubuntu 22.04? #67986
    5.0.x
  • Build doesn't fail if a MONO_API_FUNCTION isn't implemented #67985
    7.0.0
  • ARM64 - Minor regression from optimizing 'a % b' #67983
    Future
  • JIT: impDevirtualizeCall might discard commas #67982
  • Arm64: Better addressing mode for array access whose elements are accessed byref #67981
  • Pass more info about matching mode to Regex engine #67980
    7.0.0
  • .NET 7.0 Preview 3 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #67976
  • Parsing integers has regressed on arm32 #67974
  • System.Threading.Tests.Perf_Timer.ScheduleManyThenDisposeMany has regressed on 64 bit Windows #67972
  • PerfLabTests.StackWalk.Walk has regressed on arm64 #67971
  • Error using double or float values with WebAssembly #67970
  • LinqBenchmarks.Where00ForX has regressed on x86 #67968
  • PerfLabTests.LowLevelPerf.StaticDelegate has regressed on Linux x64 #67967
  • [API Proposal]: Add RuntimeFeature field to identify support for numeric IntPtr type #67966
    7.0.0
  • Async File IO has regressed on Windows #67965
    7.0.0
  • UTF8Formatter is inconsistent with and more limited than the utf16 formatting support #67962
  • BenchmarksGame.BinaryTrees benchmarks have regressed #67958
  • Improve vm's getStringLiteral for dynamic context #67956
    7.0.0
  • consider presenting IPv4-Mapped addresses as IPv4 #67952
  • Adding Dictionary<K,V> to XsdDataContractExporter adds KeyValuePair<K,V> as well #67949
  • Test failing on mono/osx/x64 - `System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.MetadataWithPerTypeAttributeContextTests.RoundTripCollectionsDictionary ` #67948
  • [release/5.0] SSL and authentication failures affecting branch CI #67947
  • [release/6.0] SSL and authentication failures affecting branch CI #67946
  • JsonNode.ToJsonString(JsonSerializerOptions options) Throw OutOfMemoryException #67943
    Future
  • Vectorize the new {Last}IndexOfAnyExcept methods #67942
    7.0.0

Closed

  • [Question] Can Virtual Stub Dispatch be "inlined"? #7198
    Future
  • Add -Wthread-safety to CoreCLR build #10364
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: System.Diagnostics.Activity: Enumeration API [Iteration 2] #67207
    7.0.0
  • Test clientandserver_oneorbothusedefault_ok failing in recent builds #67712
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: Attempt #1 - System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.CertificateValidationRemoteServer_EndToEnd_Ok(useAsync: True) #67687
    7.0.0
  • Reduce necessary DLLs footprint #12884
    Future
  • How to locate executables in nuget packages #9172
    Future
  • coreclr.lib #10359
    Future
  • ARM64: Optimize a % b operation #34937
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Api handle Activity.Current value changes #67276
    7.0.0
  • .NET 7.0 Preview 2 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #66848
    7.0.0
  • Consider Span<char> overloads on Regex classes #23602
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Regex.Enumerate(ReadOnlySpan<char>) which is allocation free #65011
    7.0.0
  • CMake WIN32 usage #3904
    Future
  • HttpConnectionPool attempts to create connections for pre-canceled requests #66990
    6.0.x
  • Ability to define the System.Text.Json attributes on implemented interfaces #67892
  • List<T>.IndexOf outputs incorrect error message #67423
    Future
  • Struct values with no set fallback to default. #67835
  • [API Proposal]: Default `IEnumerator<T>` implementation for `object IEnumerator.Current { get; }` #67751
  • C# Change this code to not construct the OS command from user-controlled data, vulnerability is coming for process.StartInfo.Arguements(args) in .net Framework 4.8 #67950
  • ZipFile.ExtractToDirectory failing with "The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect." (works in SharpZipLib) #67201
  • Add ConditionalWeakTable.TryAdd API #29368
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeInformation package lacks type forwarding facade #67063
  • With .NET 7 SDK, create razor project failed with error when running PerfView #64263
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Condition S.S.Cryptography tests on SHA1 signature support #67998
    area-System.Security
  • Various refactorings to share more code with future generators #67997
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Pass the argument to formatting function #67996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix the logic for regions detection #67995
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Revert "Enable installation on Ubuntu 22.04" #67994
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup, 5.0.x
  • Skip RegexNodeKind.UpdateBumpalong nodes when describing patterns #67992
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Move Regex pattern description into partial method remarks #67990
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Fix pointer array marshalling #67988
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Cleanup assembly loading #67984
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix the logic for regions detection #67979
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Block the test Runtime_56953 on Windows Arm32 with #67870 #67978
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use RegexCaseEquivalence table for case-insensitive backreferences #67977
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Improve JsonTestHelpers.AssertJsonEqual error messages #67973
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Check if pointer is null to prevent AV #67963
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add JSON type hierarchies as a preview feature #67961
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Permit 'R'/'r' format specifier with integer formatting #67959
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Improve retry handling for XHarness mono runtime tests #67955
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Postpone dispose of sendContentCacnellationToken for HTTP3 #67954
    area-System.Net.Http
  • remove duplicate Connect logic from TcpClient #67951
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix a randomly failing JS test #67945
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add initial version of {Last}IndexOfAnyExcept #67941
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Report SIP survivors #67940
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Expose the GetShortestBitLength, GetByteCount, and WriteLittleEndian APIs #67939
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move EventPipe thread buffer allocation outside of lock #67936
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Make it easier to enable FEATURE_AUTO_TRACE #63478
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • System.Diagnostics.Activity: Implement Enumerate* API #67920
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution
  • improve Tls12 detection on Windows7 #67935
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement
  • Add RegexFindOptimization for embedded strings #67907
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix missing timeout guard in generated regex scan loop #67964
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations part 2 #66407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support Activity.Current Changed Event #67938
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Remove "old" sgen bridge #67957
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix placeholder files in packages #67960
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add iOS Startup Scenario (Runtime side) #67670
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix cancel in PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync #66870
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 6.0.5
  • Adding Regex.EnumerateMatches #67794
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Ensure serializer reflection-dependency sentinel is accurate #67104
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.5
  • [wasm] Bump chrome used for testing to `100.0.4896.88` #67933
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable installation on Ubuntu 22.04 - add libssl3 dependency #67862
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup, 5.0.x
  • Mono - Add error on warnings #67926
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Disable test Runtime_56953 #67604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrading the version of Package Validation used in the repo to reduce Build flakiness when loading Roslyn #66635
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] [Mono] Fix uninitialized vtable bug #67759
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Bundle net472 dependencies for MonoAOTCompiler task #67757
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Add arm64 cross-arch msi installers #67265
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Add a --aot-lazy-assembly-load command line option to load assemblies #67103
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.5
  • Fixed error messages on collections indexing #67696
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add additional trace to HttpConnectionPool #66958
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Fix unaligned UTF16 string read in collect tracing EventPipe command. #66828
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Fix macOS ARM64 stack overflow detection #66612
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Add dynamic shim for SSL_CTX_set_options and SSL_set_options #67145
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #67291
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Avoid issuing connection attempts for already cancelled requests #67226
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Load R2R images on osx-arm64 according to Apple's guidelines #67438
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Ignore non-X509 certificates in SignedCms #67462
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Fix loop cloning of array of struct with array field #67496
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] [AOT] Don't set the 'CorrectedSynthesize' flag in the objc_imageinfo section. #67534
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 6.0.5
  • Fix remote unwinding on MacOS Monterey (12) #67602
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.5
  • Added tests for changing a list size being iterated on (#65608) #65615
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Expose ConditionalWeakTable.TryAdd #67923
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make ReRegisterForFinalize GC test more robust #67896
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Disable LTTNG in runtime tests by default #67937
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Update line numbers to track recent changes in JSConditionalBr… #67944
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #67927
    area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #67928
    area-Infrastructure
  • Minor fixes #67931
    area-Meta
  • avoid using TcpClient in FtpWebRequest #67881
    area-System.Net
  • Skip SIP in walk_relocation #67889
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • JIT: fix bug where a gc struct is not zero initialized #67825
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Assembly reference in unloadability #67922
    area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Add Microseconds and Nanoseconds to TimeStamp, DateTime, DateTimeOffset, and TimeOnly #67666
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Default interface implementations of static virtual methods - ECMA-335 augments #67619
    documentation
  • Handle more scenarios for loop cloning #67930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert Vector.Equals optimization #67202 #67902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [arm64] Accelerate HexConverter::EncodeToUtf16 #67192
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Add CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #67924
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Move constant vectors to op2 from op1 #67502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Tar APIs #67883
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Refactor call argument representation #67238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support ByRefLike types as Generic parameters #67783
    NO-MERGE, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • perf: Fix issues caused by a shared `dotnet` in helix correlation payload directory #67792
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Fix incorrect results of right shifting huge BigIntegers error reported in Issue #65633 #67867
    area-System.Numerics
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well #66594
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #67557
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Build improvements #64938
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Keep array MT alive while getting component size #67578
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Add support for storing method handle histograms in profiles #67919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • AddUserSecrets fails in environments without generic env var and OS special folders #67895
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Transition the x86 backend to use SSE for fp arithmetic. #65723
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Refactor code to make it easier to support LLVM 13.x in … #67692
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #67049
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Handle parameterless ctors in structs in STJ's ReflectionEmitMemberAccessor #67901
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json
  • Asynchronous opening of QuicStreams #67859
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix pal_assert.h when PAL_STDCPP_COMPAT defined #64631
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add MemoryExtensions.CommonPrefixLength #67929
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Run illink before ApiCompat #66706
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked, linkable-framework
  • Discard casts when storing normalize-on-load locals #66389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Managed implementation of NTLM for Android and tvOS #66879
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Update VSCode library debugging documentation #67925
    documentation
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • HttpHeaders should not remove invalid values during validating access #67833
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Use "..."u8 in dotnet/runtime #67733
    area-Meta

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Most dotnet commands fail with WorkloadManifestCompositionException after installing VSPreview #24854
  • Improve performance of workload installation #24843
  • `dotnet run` shouldn't report usage when the build itself fails #24842
    7.0.1xx
  • .NET 6.0 upgrade gives System.TypeLoadException Could not load type 'System.IO.File' from assembly System.Runtime Version=6.0.0.0 #24835

Closed

  • Support additional target frameworks such as for Xamarin, UWP, etc #491
    Backlog
  • Port dotnet/sdk SourceBuild patches from dotnet/installer #22281
    6.0.3xx
  • Port PackageValidation flaky build failure fixes to 6.0 #22353
    6.0.3xx
  • [Failing test] GivenThatWeWantToPublishIncrementally.It_cleans_for_mvc_projects #16456
    6.0.4xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24853
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #24852
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update the hardcoded net5.0 to the current framework #23881
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded net6.0 to the current framework #24836
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24850
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Stabilize branding for the SDK 6.0.300 #24831
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24830
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24823
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Turn test back on. #24661
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Publish support in SDK for Native Aot Application #24693
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Feature band fallback with workload update #24678
    Area-Workloads
  • Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24760
  • Pin the compiler version in RSG to an exact version #24598
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.2xx
  • bump WarningLevel to 7 for .NET 7 #24826
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Replace rollForward in tools runtimeconfig #24817
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New Inline Rename text is hard to read in blue theme #60734
  • Intellisense is frustrating in VS2022 for VB #60732
  • XML comments on partial methods aren't merged #60730
  • Date format IntelliSense popup uses local format for en-us #60729
  • C# VS2022 Bug when trying to rename variables in local static functions. #60728
  • Ensure arguments for [MaybeNullWhen] parameters don't contribute top-level nullability to type argument inference #60726
  • Quick Info should merge elements with the same name #60725
  • Consider writing MessagePack resolver that provides ForceTypelessFormatter for Roslyn abstract types #60724
  • Incorrect "IDE0004 Cast is redundant" in ternary involving nullable and Task #60720

Closed

  • Go to implementation for methods on shared base interfaces is broken #60731
  • quick action 'move type to namespace' not available when using c# 10 file scoped namespaces in VS 2022 #59716
    Backlog
  • VS's Go To Definition disassembler handles static interface methods incorrectly #60567
    17.3
  • Find All References doesn't find usages of checked user-defined operators #60216
    17.3
  • Implement interface fixer doesn't spit out `checked` keyword for checked user-defined operators #60214
    17.3
  • VSTypeScriptHandlerTests flaky #60694
  • System.ArgumentException in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.OperationMapBuilder #60424

PullRequests

Created

  • Initial .NET Framework ARM64 support #60735
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add more miscellaneous tests for checked operators #60727
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up IDiagnosticService extension methods #60723
    Area-IDE
  • Update details on "numeric IntPtr" #60722
    Area-Compilers, Documentation

Merged

  • Share the indices we create for files that do not have PP directives in them #60693
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix 'move to namespace' with file scoped namespaces. #60713
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make heading levels for warning waves documentation consistent #60721
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • IDE changes for "Unsigned Right Shift" feature, plus tests. #60689
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Avoid formatting diagnostics with raw strings #60655
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Address PROTOTYPE comments #60707
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Fix "top-level statements" feature name to match published name #60692
    Area-IDE, Next
  • NRT enable C# EditorFeatures project. #60716
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Generate static abstract interface members correctly #60618
    Area-IDE, Next
  • handle null compilations in entry point finder #60562
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60682
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Fix FAR on checked operators #60698
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add implement interface support for checked operators and cast operators #60719
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update csc.dll path in launch.json #60663
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Grab bag of UTF8 string support in IDE features #60599
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow code actions to retrieve options for any language #60697
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Stop switching /langver to preview for generator tests #60691
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix the KeybindingResetDetector #60494
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix flaky VSTypeScriptHandlerTests #60706
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60718
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Simplifier options #60174
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60737
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Refactor entry point finder code #60614
    Area-IDE
  • Add parameters in scope in nameof in certain attributes #60642
    Area-Compilers
  • Add integration test to flag MEF composition breaks #60496
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Relax requirements around second parameter of a user-defined shift operator. #60717
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings #59809
    Area-IDE
  • Safely create VirtualCharSequence from string in StackFrameParser #59283
    Area-IDE
  • Allow shared projects to specify a real project to proxy too for building and testing in VS Code #60664
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot reloading seems to mess up endpoint routing #41177
  • Resource indicators are missing in access token request #41176
  • Can't configure SSL certificate when TLS1.2 is enabled #41175
  • Quarantine AcceptNewStreamsDuringClosingConnection #41172
    Test failures
  • Kestrel ignores HostFilteringOptions on first run #41171
  • IIS: % in URL is double-unescaped #41168
    .NET 7 Planning
  • appsettings Urls takes precedence over ASPNETCORE_URLS in 6.0.4 #41167
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Call to builder.WebHost.UseUrls breaks Blazor Server app in VS17.1.4 #41165
  • AddDatabaseDeveloperPageExceptionFilter is added in all environments #41164
  • EditForm bindable validation state #41163
  • Client Certificate is discarded on TLS 1.3+IIS hosting #41162
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Hosting Bundle uninstall should uninstall underlying runtimes #40957
  • [signalr-client-c++] Client does not send access_token for calls after negotiate. #41159
  • Multiple Authentication Schemes Validation chain behavior #41130
  • MetadataTypeAttribute (still) does NOT work for Blazor WASM (.NET 6) #41142
  • dotnet D:/d1/d2/...xx/web1.dll will cause Confusing webroot-path if the command-path is different with web1.dll real path #41103
  • Root level `.vsconfig` does not provide all the necessary prerequisites #41092

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix flaky HTTP/2 test #41181
    area-runtime
  • [SignalR] Pass cancellation token to FlushAsync #41180
    area-signalr
  • [release/5.0] Fix CompGov bugs #41179
    5.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GestureRecognizer Added to parent will not be block by Child of Frame type #6088
  • Label linebreakmode tests are failing on WinUI #6084
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Release Candidate 1 Doesn't work on macOS or iOS #6082
  • MAUI can't get file data from Windows Explorer by Drag&Drop and app will crash #6080
  • BlazorWebView on iOS uses APIs that require iOS 11 or newer #6078
  • Error NETSDK1147 workloads must be installed: maui-android #6077
  • Adding resx file for additional language gives an error while trying to build iOS project #6076
  • CollectionView taps not being processed #6075
  • Release Candidate Fails #6074
  • Obsolete warnings on Device are no longer correct #6072
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [iOS] Type x:Double not found in xmlns http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2009/xaml #6070
  • Rendering after IsVisible flip is messed up #6069
  • Externally hosted images cannot load on native apps #6067
  • Custom style not getting applied to Button #6064
  • Failure to initialize App MainPage on startup after updating to RC1 #6063
  • CarouselView difficult to swipe on Android #6062
  • AppShell Flyout Content Missing #6061
  • Row Height in Fill not working inside a ScrollView #6058
  • [RC1] Cannot build MAUI library #6052
  • Create ContentPage VS template not using proper namespace when adding new ContentPage inside a folder #6049
  • [Bug] Grid Spacing is not Pixel-Perfect #6047
  • Make IResourcesProvider public to be able to register this on the DI Container #6045
  • ERROR ITMS-90165: Invalid Provisioning Profile Signature #6044
  • [RC1] - iOS FontImageSource in AppShell TabBar Pixelation #6043
  • [BUG] Error NETSDK1005 after changes in .csproj file #6040
  • ApplicationDisplayVersion problem ITMS-90062 error #6037
  • The SearchHandler is not rendered on Windows #6036
  • Windows content page(C#) cannot be hot reloaded #6035
  • Debugging is harder than it need be #6034
  • Shell flyout item text sometimes blank #6033
  • View is overflowing when view parent has padding. #6032
  • [Bug] LayoutOptions Expand not work in HorizontalStackLayout and VerticalStackLayout #6031
  • [RC1] Label MaxLines doesn't work #6030

Closed

  • BarBackgroundColor and BarTextColor don't change color on Android #5590
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Android - APT2000 build error when project path contains non-ASCII symbols #5957
  • [6.0.300-rc.1] iOS debugging/hot reload doesn't work. "XAML Hot Reload encountered a problem and failed to start." #6055
  • Label not getting resized to the change in Text length on Android #6066
  • Android - APT2126 XML files not found when moving built project to a different path #5956
  • Error with Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite #6050
  • Maui and Grpc cannot work together on MacOS? #6057
  • DisplayAlert bug #4253
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • .NET Maui RC1 On Click counter not show Android #6073
  • Install MAUI RC1 workloads fails on Mac #6038
  • MauiAppBuilder' does not contain a definition for 'RegisterBlazorMauiWebView' #6056
  • BlazorWebView API review: Open questions #5904
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Unable to build Windows class libraries with dotnet build #5886
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • DynamicResource binding not working #5044
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] BackgroundColor of Entry not work #6029
  • Maui Windows unpackaged app fails to start #5927

PullRequests

Created

  • Leave the content panel active on the Windows scrollview at all times #6087
  • Fix for 3848 - FlexLayout doesn't measure content #6085
    area/layout 🔲
  • Use the correct text in the [Obsolete] attributes #6079
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [X] Remove hacks for StaticResourceExtension #6065
    area/Xaml </>
  • Avoid notify changes from a null or disposed control #6060
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix FlowDirection issue #6054
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/localization
  • [Android] Fix crash adding/removing SwipeItems dynamically in the SwipeView #6053
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/SwipeView
  • Made IResourceProvider public #6046

Merged

  • Update ASP.NET Core Packages to 6.0.4 And Remove Coherent Dependency #6014

  • Always use the MSIX tooling #6068
    area/single project ☝️, p/0, fatal, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Fix AppTitleBarHeight to match caption button heights #5811
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Make RC1 current version in bug report template #6039
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Housekeeping] Update samples in Gallery to use BackgroundColor and Background properties everywhere #6042
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Maui Windows unpackaged app fails to start #5979
    area/desktop 🖥️, area/publishing 🏁
  • Remove downcasts in BlazorWebView #5984

Updated

  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • Add public api analyzer to Maui.Core #6003

  • [iOS] Implement iOSPlatform Specifics #5879

  • Fix violations of Platform Compatibility Analyzer CA1416 #5650

  • [workload] Merge Dependencies and Extensions packs #5918

  • Fix nullable annotations for `Preferences` #6013
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Correctly notify changes in the Page BackgroundColor property #5706
